attributes.action: Bring back an ambulance station and stand by ambulances in Rugby, Warwickshire
attributes.additional_details: Delay times are catastrophic in Rugby and ambulances are needed closer than Coventry. Target times not being met and patients dying before ambulances arrive, including our son, Jamie
attributes.background: Provide funding to West Midlands ambulance trust to enable them to provide an ambulance station and stand by ambulances for the ever growing town of Rugby, Warwickshire

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the ambulance service.
